gololang.ir

Class ConditionalBranching

  • java.lang.Object
    • gololang.ir.GoloElement<T>
      • gololang.ir.GoloStatement<ConditionalBranching>
        • gololang.ir.ConditionalBranching

  • public final class ConditionalBranching
extends GoloStatement<ConditionalBranching>
    Represents a conditional branching.

    Typically an if else node.

      • branch

        public static ConditionalBranching branch()
        Creates an empty conditional branch.

      • create

        public static ConditionalBranching create(java.lang.Object condition,
                                          java.lang.Object trueBlock,
                                          java.lang.Object falseBlock,
                                          java.lang.Object elseBranch)
        Full branch construction in one call.

        Less readable than the fluent API, but useful when doing meta-generation

        Parameters:
        condition - the test condition
        trueBlock - the block to execute when the condition is true
        falseBlock - the block to execute when the condition is false
        elseBranch - a nested conditional branch

      • condition

        public ConditionalBranching condition(java.lang.Object cond)
        Defines the condition of the branching.

        This is a builder method.

        Parameters:
        cond - the expression defining the condition. If null, the condition is set to false.
        Returns:
        the branching.

      • elseBranch

        public ConditionalBranching elseBranch(java.lang.Object elseBranch)
        Defines a nested conditional branch.

        This is a builder method.

        This represents an else if branch.

        See Also:
        otherwise(Object)

      • otherwise

        public ConditionalBranching otherwise(java.lang.Object alternative)
        Defines a block to execute when false or a nested branch according to the given element.

        This is a builder method; it's the preferred way to define an alternative to the true block.

        Parameters:
        alternative - a Block to execute when false or a ConditionalBranching defining a nested branch.

        Replace a child.
